title: Replace Standings table and remove average fish size tracker

requirements.text: Replace the existing standings table on the Standings page (frontend/src/pages/Top10.tsx) with a new 'Top 25 Standings' table containing these exact columns in order: Rank, Angler, Adj Pts, Behind Leader, Events, Move, Notes. Populate with the 24 anglers plus 1 'Unknown / Name Error' entry as specified in the user's data.

quotes: replace the current table with this new table
Create a "Standings Table" section for the Benning Bass Club website

acceptanceCriteria: Table displays all 24 named anglers plus the 'Unknown / Name Error' entry
Columns appear in exact order: Rank, Angler, Adj Pts, Behind Leader, Events, Move, Notes
All data values match the user-provided standings data exactly

requirements.text: Add section title 'Top 25 Standings' and subtitle 'Adjusted standings through January 2026' above the standings table.
acceptanceCriteria: Title 'Top 25 Standings' appears above the table
Subtitle 'Adjusted standings through January 2026' appears below the title

requirements.text: Implement sticky table header that remains visible when scrolling through the standings table.
acceptanceCriteria: Table header row remains fixed at top when user scrolls down
Header maintains its styling while sticky

requirements.text: Apply zebra striping to table rows for improved readability.
acceptanceCriteria: Alternating rows have different background colors
Striping pattern is consistent throughout the table

requirements.text: Highlight the first place row (Rank 1, Cox, Clint) with a subtle gold or green accent to distinguish the leader.

quotes: Highlight row 1 with a subtle gold/green accent

acceptanceCriteria: First row has a visually distinct gold or green background accent
Accent is subtle and does not interfere with text readability

requirements.text: Display Notes column values as small colored badges with different styles for: 'Leader', 'Tied', 'Perfect attendance', 'Missed 1 event', 'Missed 2 events', 'Missed multiple events', 'Partial season', and 'Needs correction in source sheet'.

quotes: Use small colored badges in Notes (Leader, Tied, Perfect attendance, Missed 1 event)

acceptanceCriteria: Each note appears as a styled badge with appropriate color coding
Multiple notes in same cell are displayed as separate badges
Badge colors are consistent for each note type

requirements.text: Color-code Move column arrows: green for upward movement (↑), red for downward movement (↓), and gray for no movement (—).
acceptanceCriteria: Upward arrows display in green
Downward arrows display in red
No-change indicators display in gray

requirements.text: Right-align all numeric columns (Rank, Adj Pts, Behind Leader, Events) and keep the Angler column left-aligned.
acceptanceCriteria: Rank, Adj Pts, Behind Leader, and Events columns are right-aligned
Angler column remains left-aligned
Column headers match the alignment of their data

requirements.text: Enable horizontal scrolling on mobile devices for the standings table to ensure all columns remain accessible on smaller screens.
acceptanceCriteria: Table scrolls horizontally on mobile viewport sizes
All columns are accessible via horizontal scroll
Table maintains its structure and does not break layout

requirements.text: Remove the average fish size tracker component from the homepage (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx).

quotes: the homepage has an average fish size tracker, please take it off for now as we dont have those stats in the new table

acceptanceCriteria: Average fish size tracker no longer appears on the homepage
Homepage layout adjusts appropriately after removal
No broken references or console errors result from removal

constraints: Keep the Standings page structure intact (navigation, header, footer)
Data must be hardcoded for now; do not implement admin editing functionality yet
Use existing design system and Tailwind CSS classes consistent with the rest of the site
nonGoals: Admin interface for updating standings data
Real-time data fetching or backend integration for standings
Sorting or filtering functionality for the standings table
